00011 class SingleLinkedListItemBase
00012 {
00013 public:
00017     bool    linked() const      {return 0 != m_next || 0 != m_previous;}
00018 
00019 protected:
00020     SingleLinkedListItemBase() : m_next(0), m_previous(0) {}
00021     virtual ~SingleLinkedListItemBase();
00022 
00023     friend class SingleLinkedListBase;
00024     SingleLinkedListItemBase* m_next; 
00025     SingleLinkedListItemBase* m_previous;
00026 
00027 private:
00028     SingleLinkedListItemBase( const SingleLinkedListItemBase& );
00029     SingleLinkedListItemBase& operator=( const SingleLinkedListItemBase& );
00030 };
00031 
00032 class SingleLinkedListBase
00033 {
00034 public:
00035     SingleLinkedListBase();
00036     virtual ~SingleLinkedListBase();
00037     
00038     void    insert( SingleLinkedListItemBase* item );
00039     void    remove( SingleLinkedListItemBase* item );
00040 
00041     SingleLinkedListItemBase*       last() const;
00042 
00043 protected:
00044     SingleLinkedListItemBase*       m_first;
00045 
00046 private:
00047     SingleLinkedListBase( const SingleLinkedListBase& );
00048     SingleLinkedListBase& operator=( const SingleLinkedListBase& );
00049 };
00050 
00055 template <class T> class SingleLinkedListItem :
00056     public SingleLinkedListItemBase
00057 {
00058 public:
00062     T*      next() const            {return static_cast<T*>( m_next );}
00063 
00067     T*      previous() const        {return static_cast<T*>( m_previous );}
00068 };
00069 
00074 template <class T> class SingleLinkedList :
00075     public SingleLinkedListBase
00076 {
00077 public:
00081     void    insert( T* item )       {SingleLinkedListBase::insert( item );}
00082 
00086     void    remove( T* item )       {SingleLinkedListBase::remove( item );}
00087 
00091     T*      first() const           {return static_cast<T*>( m_first );}
00092     
00096     T*      last() const            {return static_cast<T*>( SingleLinkedListBase::last() );}
00097 };
